name: Comic Strip Trivia Quiz | Comics | 10 Questions

questions.text: ' Holey moley' is associated with which comic book hero?
questions.explanation:
Captain Marvel.

	The final answer is Captain Marvel

questions.text: What is the name of Blondie and Dagwood's dog?
A great dane stars in which comic strip?
Name the adopted son of Dick Tracy and Tess Truehart.
questions.explanation:
Junior.

	Believe it or not it's Junior.

questions.text: What is the profession of Brenda Starr?
questions.explanation:
Newspaper Reporter.

	The headlines are newspaper reporter

questions.text: What is the last name of the Terry and the Pirates hero?
Which Peanuts character Believes in the Great Pumpkin?
Who was the antagonist of Terry and the Pirates?
questions.explanation:
Dragon Lady.

	Dragon Lady she's the one.

questions.text: In 'Peanuts' who is always falling asleep in class?
questions.explanation:
Peppermint Patty.

	Wake up it's Peppermint Patty.
